HOME_DELIVERY.free_delivery_limit: Free for orders over 1,999 Kč. Free for products marked 'Online Only'.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: An SMS with the delivery date is sent in advance, and on the day of delivery, another SMS with a 3-hour time window is sent. Deliveries are usually made on working days between 8:00 and 17:00.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing:
499 Kč for orders up to 6,999.99 Kč.
999 Kč for orders up to 22,998.99 Kč.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.free_delivery_limit: Free for orders from 22,999 Kč. Free for products marked 'Online Only'.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: The delivery date is arranged in advance by phone. Deliveries are usually made on working days between 8:00 and 17:00.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.locations: Available at 12 stores across the Czech Republic.

weekend_delivery.days: Depends on the opening hours of the selected store.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: XXXLutz.cz offers home delivery for standard parcels and bulky goods, as well as free in-store pickup. Parcel shop and parcel locker delivery are not available. Deliveries are made only within the Czech Republic.
PROVIDERS: Standard parcels are delivered by DPD, while bulky items are handled by the Gebrüder Weiss shipping company.
PRICING: Standard parcel delivery costs 149 Kč (free over 1,999 Kč). Bulky item delivery costs 499 Kč (up to 6,999.99 Kč) or 999 Kč (up to 22,998.99 Kč), with free delivery for orders from 22,999 Kč. In-store pickup is always free. Products marked 'Online Only' have free delivery.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Delivery of bulky goods includes carrying items to the desired floor, except for 'Online Only' products. The company also offers a van rental service for customers who prefer to transport their purchases themselves.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is consolidated on a single, easy-to-find page. The pricing structure is clearly detailed. However, information regarding COD surcharges and specific delivery timeframes (e.g., 2-3 business days) is missing. There is also a minor inconsistency in the free shipping threshold for bulky goods mentioned in different sections of the page.
